metadata.title: CVE-2020-6630 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0. There is a NULL pointerdereference in the function gf_isom_get_media_data_size() inisomedia/isom_read.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
